sentences.sCn: 他的支持者欣赏他的果决。

sentences.sContent: The qualities that make a good manager can come down to decisiveness.
sentences.sContent_eng: The qualities that make a good manager can come down to decisiveness.
sentences.sCn: 优秀经理人员的特点可以归结为一个词：果断。

sentences.sContent: Rattan really inborn man who will do worthwhile somewhat , he possess the decisiveness disposition .
sentences.sContent_eng: Rattan really inborn man who will do worthwhile somewhat , he possess the decisiveness disposition .
sentences.sCn: 藤真是一个天生要有所作为的人，他有决断的性格。

remMethod.val: 来自decisive(adj. 坚决的， 果断的)

words.tran: 决定性的；果断的，坚定的
明确的；显然的；坚决的，果断的
果断地；断然地；明显；毫无疑问
